long_description: we are wonderland resort, and we provide unique & unforgettable experiences for families, couples, businesspeople, or just energized individuals who want to have an exquisite stay in our luxury hotel and have fun trying a lot of new & unique activities or party all night long. located in a peaceful and hilly region, just 7 km from cluj-napoca's old town, this enchanting resort is designed to transport you into a fairy tale world. if you're looking for exciting activities, this is the perfect place for you. you can enjoy your stay in comfort thanks to the resort's spacious, minimalist and luxury rooms. the international restaurant offers a diverse menu, as well as eccentric d√©cor and a breathtaking city view that makes for an unforgettable eating experience. for those looking to stay active, there's a gym and bike rentals available, and guests can take advantage of the outdoor pool (coming soon) and terrace to relax and unwind. the resort offers an array of exciting activities such as paintball, soccer, horseback riding, and hot air balloon rides. there is also a game room with a pool table where you can play a friendly game with your family and friends.
